what-it-does: Checks for any pyproject.toml that does not conform to the schema from the relevant PEPs.
why-is-this-bad: Your project may contain invalid metadata or configuration without you noticing
example:
[project]
name = "crab"
version = "1.0.0"
authors = ["Ferris the Crab <[email protected]>"]



Use instead:


[project]
name = "crab"
version = "1.0.0"
authors = [
  { name = "Ferris the Crab", email = "[email protected]" }
]

example-split.example-before:
[project]
name = "crab"
version = "1.0.0"
authors = ["Ferris the Crab <[email protected]>"]
